welcome_message_body: Welcome to Springfield, where the charm of our historic downtown and the beauty of our natural surroundings await you. Known for our rich history and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Black Rock Steakhouse
restaurants.description: Black Rock Steakhouse is a steakhouse located in Springfield.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnes Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barnes Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brainard Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
